title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1645-1.1 - Investment of excess funds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1645-1.1 - Investment of excess funds

State Regulations

The division will require local agencies to invest, promptly, all excess funds in their custody. Excess funds, as a general rule, mean cash in checking accounts not required for disbursement within a period of
one or, at most, two months. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1645-1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
